jobDescription: Job Title : SQL Developer  Duration : 6+ months  Multiple locations Roll Summary : 4-8 years work related experience.  Looking for a SQL Developer with Python and Azure (Data Lake or Storage) good experience.  Partner with Business Analytics and Data Engineering teams working for Marketing users to interpret their needs and surface insights which can drive actionable decision making.  Surface insights from data and evangelize UI and design needs, demonstrating creativity, problem-solving, data visualization, and design competence.  Leverage data visualization platforms and techniques (specifically Tableau and PowerPoint) to help users explore and understand complex data sets  Design and implement prototypes and create advanced Tableau visualizations using advanced filters and parameters.  Advanced Tableau development including Tableau data model creation, customize dimensions, advanced calculations, and interactive dashboards.  Work on moderate data engineering work in SQL to support backend development needed to surface insights through visualizations.  Keeps abreast of current trends related to Tableau and other BI technologies.  Drive effective teamwork, communication and collaboration to achieve results.  Develop a strong understanding of the business, strategic direction, organizational structure and overall business goals.  Promote a risk-aware culture, ensure efficient and effective risk and compliance management practices by adhering to required standards and processes. Qualifications This person should be able to create exciting and high-quality visualizations in Tableau and PowerPoint  Strong experience in Tableau dashboard development /Python / Azure  Interested people may reach at tony@kivishinfotech.com
